dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Hmph. Did you wish to witness the art performed in a training room?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg:
It's getting loud outside... They must be making a ruckus preparing breakfast again.
Hmph, no delicious meal can possibly be better than a good training session.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามกลางวัน
dataList.dlg: It's already midday...? I.D.C. Don't call me unless it's for work. I don't intend to leave this room unless it's for a job.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg:
There are no particular conditions for sleeping and waking. Humans sleep when tired and wake up when no longer tired. It doesn't matter where one goes to sleep.
Besides, sleeping against this training dummy is more comfortable than you'd expect. Heh.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
Warmth. Kinship. They're the 'core values' of Liu... Hah. Sure, of course.
But the only core value of Liu that I've come to know is that it scorches and burns. That's all there is to it.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
The flame is powerful, impressive... but it also carries frailty and fragility.
The only way to keep the fire burning is to feed it firewood ceaselessly. And that 'firewood' is endless training.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
Burn marks are like enhancement tattoos; it hurts like hell when drawing them, and they paint parts of your skin in different colors.
... And the more of your skin is covered with them... the stronger you get.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
Hah! I can't believe they're more fragile even than a training dummy. It almost feels wasteful to spark my flames against them.
... Hm, though I suppose it can be quite entertaining to watch their distorting shapes as the fire burns them alive.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
C.S... then P.S. This flesh-burning, penetrating strike is the perfect finisher to this series of breakneck-speed consecutive strikes.
Consider it a glass of wine to a plate of perfectly grilled steak.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Hm. What, need some fire?

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Section Director... Thought she was a useless loudmouth, but she taught me this particularly useful skill. Heh, I could use this as a finisher.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Is this a job? Then I'll be there.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Moving dummies... this could be interesting.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Scram. I'm trying to focus.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: First Form!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Get up. A wooden dummy stands taller than you do.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Tsk...!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Tsk, already broken. How useless.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Haah... These... moving dummies must've been... insufficient training material.

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: What a waste of time.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: That is what you get for wasting my time.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: It is done. Well, I see that facing moving targets can sometimes be entertaining. It's just disappointing that I saw this outcome from a mile away.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: They couldn't even measure up to training dummies... This victory was so overwhelming that it was practically dull. I'm going back to training.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: We... lost...? N.W. No way we lost to these fleshy dummies. My training routine cannot possibly be wrong...!
